title: How Strengthening Your Marriage Improves Your Parenting
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. David Clarke
itunes:summary:
The best thing you can do for your kids is strengthen your marriage. John and Danny offer practical tips for prioritizing your relationship with your spouse.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Dr. David Clarke's book "Parenting is Hard and Then You Die: A Fun But Honest Look at Raising Kids of All Ages Right": https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-01-05?refcd=1039502

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/how-strengthening-your-marriage-improves-your-parenting/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
